casebody.data:
No. 09-1212. Norfolk Southern Railway Company, Petitioner v. Billy Groves, Individually, dba Savannah Re-Load, et al. 562 U.S. 1194, 131 S. Ct. 993,

178 L. Ed. 2d 854,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 636. January 18, 2011.

Motion of Association of American Railroads for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 586 F.3d 1273.
